HomeHero.description: Bridging Korea and the USA with Unforgettable Travel Experiences

OurMission.title: Our mission
OurMission.content: Seamless, Exciting, and Unforgettable – Our Travel Promise

card1.title: Your Trusted Travel Partner
card1.content: From Los Angeles to the Grand Canyon, we specialize in Western USA travel with expert planning and seamless experiences. Let us handle the details while you enjoy the journey.

card2.title: Personalized & Hassle-Free Tours
card2.content: Every traveler is unique. Whether it's a customized LA tour, family vacation, or small group trip, we design experiences tailored to your needs for an unforgettable adventure.

card3.title: Seamless & Reliable Travel
card3.content: From airport pickups to guided Western US sightseeing tours, we ensure stress-free and smooth journeys. Travel confidently with our expertly curated itineraries and local insights.

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.content: Travel With Ease, Explore With Confidence
HowItWorks.secondaryContent: Navigating the Western USA has never been easier. With The Ace, you'll experience expertly guided adventures, seamless travel, and personalized care—just like traveling with family

card1.title: Pick Your Perfect Western USA Adventure
card1.content: From Los Angeles to the Grand Canyon, choose from a variety of guided tours, semi-packages, and customized trips that fit your travel style.

card2.title: Travel Comfortably in a Small Group
card2.content: Enjoy a stress-free experience with intimate group tours, personalized attention, and expert guides who know Western USA's best-kept secrets.

card3.title: Explore at Your Own Pace
card3.content: Whether you prefer structured itineraries or independent exploration, our tours offer the perfect balance of guided experiences and free time.

story2.name: Go*Hyeon
story2.text: 2025년도 20기로 다녀왔습니다. 혹시 미국 서부 여행 계획중이시고 주요 관광지를 모두 방문하면서 자유일정까지 챙길 생각 있으시면 무조건 신청하시는거 추천드릴게요. ✅1.자율성 세미패키지라 전체일정의 90프로....

SupportHero.title: How Can We Assist You with Your US Travel?

SupportFAQ.title: FAQ
SupportFAQ.content: Frequently Asked Questions – US Travel & ACE Tour Information

card1.title: How do I book a shuttle service?
card1.content: You can book our shuttle service through our website by using the booking form on our Shuttle Service page. Select your pickup location, destination, date, and the number of passengers. You'll receive a confirmation email with your booking details.

card2.title: What is your cancellation policy?
card2.content: Our standard cancellation policy allows free cancellation up to 24 hours before your scheduled pickup time. Cancellations made within 24 hours of the pickup time may be subject to a cancellation fee.

card3.title: Do you offer group discounts?
card3.content: Yes, we offer special rates for group bookings of 10 or more passengers. Please contact our support team for more information about group rates and arrangements.

card4.title: What if my flight is delayed?
card4.content: We monitor all flight arrivals. If your flight is delayed, we'll adjust your pickup time accordingly at no extra charge. Please make sure to provide your flight details during booking.
